label: Behavior 92354284
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: anchored or moored in a confined area (the vessel shows no movement in position over time—latitude and longitude remain nearly unchanged—and zero SOG confirms it is not under way; however, fluctuating COG with stable heading suggests the vessel is swinging at anchor due to wind or current while maintaining its heading reference; this behavior is typical of vessels at anchor in a sheltered harbor or mooring point, where position remains fixed within sensor precision: lat ≈ 56.15146 ± 0.000002, lon ≈ 10.236055 ± 0.000002)
